QuestData.Title: Titanic Evolution
QuestData.Description: Ah, hello! Do not look so surprised! Did I not also brave the dangers of the Mogu'shan Vaults? I am more sturdy than I look!$B$BI have learned many things of this wonderful place in history already. Did you know that, just like on our world, the titans once came to this place?$B$BAt least, that is what I believe! Surely there are signs of the titans' presence here, even now. Should you find one, I would very much like to see it!
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect an Overgrown Artifact from The Everbloom.
